scripts.start-fakeyou: PORT=7000 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou -- yarn start
scripts.start-fakeyou-w: set PORT=7000 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/fakeyou -- yarn start-w
scripts.start-storyteller-home: PORT=7008 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller-home -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller-obs: PORT=7007 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller-obs -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller-stream: PORT=7001 BROWSER=none lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller -- yarn start
scripts.start-storyteller-stream-w: set PORT=7001 && lerna exec --scope @storyteller/storyteller-stream -- yarn start-w
